listitem.para: GOBO: To run EDoc a CVS version of GOBO is required. This is necessary because the GOBO Eiffel parser API changed since the latest release and EDoc uses the new API.
The CVS version should be newer than September 2005. The latest version used in developement was from 11. Oktober 2005.

Eiffel: EDoc works with ISE's and SmartEiffel's compiler. The tested ISE version is 5.6, the SmartEiffel version is 2.2 beta. When SmartEiffel 2.2 is fully compatible with GOBO's CVS version, EDoc should be compatible as well.

Platform: The developement platform was Linux. But since the only dependency is GOBO and all file manipulation is done through GOBO's file system operations, EDoc should run on all platforms which support GOBO and the mentioned Eiffel compilers. In particular Windows was tested with the ISE 5.6 compiler.

section.title: Installation
section.para: To install EDoc switch to the base directory of EDoc and run 'geant compile'. This will generate the executable.

If you want to launch EDoc from another location than the installation directory you should set the environment variable EDOC to the installation directory. If you always launch EDoc from the installation directory this is not necessary.
